fields.name: Drive-by Effect:
fields.value: - Stop moving and end your turn here. You may pay 250$ to not have this happen, if you choose.

fields.name: Stop-in Effect:
fields.value: - Does not activate if you land here because of the Drive-By Effect. Earn 250$, x the amount of people who paid to not have the Drive-By Effect happen since the last time the Stop-In Effect happened.

fields.name: Attribute:
fields.value: - Can not be a corner space.
